entry.tran: 繁缕，卷耳(开白色小花，贴地生长)
entry.def: Chickweed is a plant with small leaves and white flowers which grows close to the ground.

means.word_mean: 1. any of various plants of the genus Stellaria
2. any of various plants related to the common chickweed
